fr.inria.atlanmod.mogwai.common.util

Class MogwaiQueryUtil

  • Object
    • MogwaiQueryUtil

  • public class MogwaiQueryUtil
extends Object
    Provides utility methods to load file and check if the application is executed within Eclipse.
    Author:
    Gwendal DANIEL

    • Method Detail

      • getFileURL

        public static URL getFileURL(Class<?> fromClass,
                             String fileName)
                      throws IOException
        Retrieves the URL associated to fileName
        Parameters:
        fromClass - the calling Class. This parameter is mandatory in OSGI environment, where classloaders are bundle-specific.
        fileName - the name of the file to get the URL of
        Returns:
        an URL representing fileName's location
        Throws:
        IOException - if fileName cannot be found

      • isEclipseRunning

        public static boolean isEclipseRunning()
        Returns whether the executed application is running inside Eclipse.
        Returns:
        true if the executed application is running inside Eclipse, false otherwise
